name: GroupAngle
overview:
Your world. Organized.

GroupAngle is a catalog for things. GroupAngle lets you capture web information and save it to collections.

The web is built on top of a mountain of information which is not organized.
GroupAngle lets you capture the information about things you like, want, or need on the web, share it, and build apps on top of the data platform. Save the information to one of your collections. Share what you like with your friends.

GroupAngle is a company that offers users easy ways to find structured from across the entire web.

GroupAngle was founded by Derek Pappas in 2010.
